enWisdom: It is by action, not laziness, that reward is gained
The fruit of [good] action is the [divine] reward given for it
The reward of your action is greater than your action

Wisdom: ثَوَابُ الْعَمَلِ عَلَى قَدْرِ الْمَشَقَّةِ فِيهِ
enWisdom: The reward for an action is to the extent of the difficulty [endured] in it

Wisdom: ثَوَابُ الْعَمَلِ [الْعِلْمِ‏] يُخَلِّدُكَ وَلَا يَبْلَى وَيُبْقِيكَ وَلَا يَفْنَى
enWisdom: The garment of action (or knowledge) immortalizes you and does not get worn out; it preserves you and does not perish

Wisdom: ثَابِرُوا عَلَى اغْتِنَامِ عَمَلٍ لَا يَفْنَى ثَوَابُهُ
enWisdom: Persist in seizing the opportunity of performing the action whose reward does not perish
The reward for an action is the fruit of the action

Wisdom: جَعَلَ اللَّهُ لِكُلِّ عَمَلٍ ثَوَاباً وَلِكُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ حِسَاباً وَلِكُلِّ أَجَلٍ كِتَاباً
enWisdom: Allah has kept for every [good] deed a reward, for everything a reckoning and for every term a written appointment

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِأَوَامِرِ اللَّهِ أَحْرَزَ الْأَجْرَ
enWisdom: Whoever acts upon the commandments of Allah, obtains reward
Act [in this world] so that you can store [provisions for the Hereafter]

Wisdom: التَّارِكُ لِلْعَمَلِ غَيْرُ مُوقِنٍ بِالثَّوَابِ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The one who abandons [a good] action has no certainty about its reward

Wisdom: لَا ثَوَابَ لِمَنْ لَا عَمَلَ لَهُ
enWisdom: There is no reward for one who has no [good] deeds
